p: Climate change influences HQ by shifting plant distribution, phenology, biological events, food availability timing, and landscape connectivity (Chen et al. 2011, 2018; Guo et al. 2015). The impact of climate change is particularly evident in mountainous areas (Kelly and Goulden 2008). This is consistent with the results observed in the Hengduan Mountains.
